pr_title: Adding Authentication handlers for API and Web Server
pr_body:
## Description
Created the API for login, register, and logout functionality. The register API accepts email, password, confirm_password, and name of the new user, and hence I updated the User model to accommodate the same. The login returns the JWT Token on successful login and sets the cookie for the user. I also created a model for API tokens having user_id and api_key fields and API endpoint for creating API tokens which generate an API token for the authenticated user.

Tried implementing the following:
- [x]  API handlers for the register, login, and logout functionality.
- [x] Tokens for OWTF REST API (ideally JWT tokens)
- [x] A way for users to create API tokens.
- [x] Users, APITokens models, and integration with current DB schema.

## Related Issue
Fix for #946 

## Reviewers
@viyatb @sharmamohit123 

## How Has This Been Tested?
I have tested all the APIs using PostMan
